com.pilot.jword.view
Class PagedDocumentView

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.text.View
      javax.swing.text.CompositeView
          javax.swing.text.BoxView
              javax.swing.text.FlowView
                  com.pilot.jword.view.PagedDocumentView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class PagedDocumentView
extends javax.swing.text.FlowView

This class is responsible for paging the body part of the document. It has a special flow strategy for paging.

Nested Class Summary
 class PagedDocumentView.PageFlowStrategy
          A flow strategy for paging.
